review.comment: Best experience I've personally ever had purchasing a used 2015 Ford Lariat. They have great selection, and I didn't have to sit and wait all day. Professional and friendly staff!
Just got me a new truck from here and had great service. Would definitely recommend getting in touch with Arsalan, he will get you in and out the door and will help you in any way he can!

United Auto Sales is a highly professional company. They are dedicated to offering a pleasant environment in which you can select your future vehicle through their classy website. They don’t pressure or subject anyone to sales tactics.
Mohammad is the man. Set me up in my dream truck and couldn’t be more pleased. Easiest deal I’ve ever done. Great folks to work with.
If anyone looking for a great and reliable used car go down to United Auto sales asked for Arsalan he will most definitely in you approved for something!!!
United Auto Sales are very amazing. They're quick at executing work and reliable.
Just got a used car from here; love it already. Everyone there was nice and super helpful, especially Mohammad. Huge thank you to him for getting us a great deal and in and out in a timely manner!

My husband & I had a wonderful experience this morning with Arsalan and Mohammad this morning, they helped us get in exactly what we were looking for in an upgrade. We are very happy with our 2018 BMW 4 Series 430i xDrive Gran Coupe. Great deals, great wheels!
review.review_reply: Thank you Damon for the 5 star review! Thank you for buying the 2018 Chevy Equinox! We enjoyed working with you, we value your business and hope to see you again!
